EmailTemplate.description: $799 sub offer for April (from 4-3-14 promo email)
EmailTemplate.name: Internal audit benchmarks
EmailTemplate.subject: Internal audit benchmarks—what people are saying
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Recently we covered the results of several benchmark surveys detailing the challenges internal auditors face—like unclear duties, strategic risk, and increased regulatory complexity that border on alarming.
See it here: http://www.complianceweek.com/internal-audit-facing-multiple-challenges-surveys-say/article/339227/
Access benchmark coverage like this—email Angela to begin your subscription for just $799*. Or call (617) 570-8617
*offer is for a single-user subscription and available to first-time subscribers only through July 30, 2014.
